SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_TOTAL# = "" :SET &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_SUCCESS# = "" :SET &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_FAILED# = "" :SET &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_NOT_PROCESSED# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_HRV_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_TOTAL" : SET &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_TOTAL# = "&VALUE#" : CASE "UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_SUCCESS" : SET &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_SUCCESS# = "&VALUE#" : CASE "UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_FAILED" : SET &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_FAILED# = "&VALUE#" : CASE "UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_NOT_PROCESSED" : SET &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_NOT_PROCESSED# = "&VALUE#" : ENDSWITCH
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_TOTAL#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_SUCCESS#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_NOT_PROCESSED#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_HRV_COUNT_FAILED#,,"WORKFLOW"
